fields.value: -Before game start (and BEFORE allies revealed) , but AFTER roles are locked, all players will be  asked if they wish to be converted to a follower of zefra

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- everyone who chooses yes (up to X- where X is host decision), gets converted. Random/hosts choice if more than X
- Their goal becomes Kill all who would oppose zefra
- can't win with other cults
- Cult members do not know each other. You don't either.

fields.name: goal:
